languages.text: Все кости хладной торговки переломаны, аугментированная рука вырвана из сочленения, а фаланги каждого пальца на оставшейся конечности вывернуты.

traits.locale_text: Все кости торговки переломаны, аугментированная рука вырвана из сочленения, а фаланги каждого пальца на оставшейся конечности вывернуты.

languages.text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.
languages.original_text: Все кости хладной торговки переломаны, аугментированная рука вырвана из сочленения, а фаланги каждого пальца на оставшейся конечности вывернуты.

traits.locale_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, the augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the phalanxes of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out.
All of the trader's bones were broken, the augmented arm was ripped from its socket and the phalanxes of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out.
All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, the augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the phalanxes of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out.
All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, the augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the phalanxes of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out.
All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.
All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

languages.text: Les os de la contrebandière ont été brisés un à un, son bras augmenté a été arraché et les doigts de son autre main sont tous tordus dans des positions impossibles.
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: Les os de la contrebandière ont été brisés un à un, son bras augmenté a été arraché et les doigts de son autre main sont tous tordus dans des positions impossibles.

languages.text: 婕伊浑身上下每根骨头都被打断了，带有植入物的手臂从关节窝里扯了出来。剩下的那只手，每根手指的指骨都被扯了出来，以诡异的角度扭曲着伸到了皮肉外面。
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊浑身上下每根骨头都被打断了，带有植入物的手臂从关节窝里扯了出来。剩下的那只手，每根手指的手骨头都被扯了出来，扭曲着伸到了皮肉外面。

languages.text: コールド・トレーダーの骨はすべて折れており、拡張された腕はソケットから引きちぎられ、残った手の指の骨もすべてねじれて変な角度で突き出ている。
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: コールド・トレーダーの骨はすべて折れており、拡張された腕はソケットから引きちぎられ、残った手の指の骨もすべてねじれて変な角度で突き出ている。

languages.text: Sämtliche Knochen der Kalthändlerin wurden ihr gebrochen, der augmentierte Arm wurde aus der Gelenkpfanne herausgerissen und die Knochen aller Finger an der verbliebenen Hand sind verdreht und stehen in merkwürdigen Winkeln ab.
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche Knochen der Kalthändlerin waren gebrochen, der augmentierte Arm wurde aus der Gelenkpfanne herausgerissen und alle Fingerglieder an der verbliebenen Hand waren verdreht und hervorstehend.

languages.text: Todos los huesos de la Comerciante Fría están rotos, le han arrancado de cuajo el brazo aumentado, y los huesos de todos los dedos de su mano sana están descoyuntadas, doblándose en ángulos muy pronunciados.
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: Todos los huesos de la Comerciante Fría están rotos, le han arrancado de cuajo el brazo aumentado, y las falanges de todos los dedos de su mano sana están descoyuntadas.

languages.text: Soğuk Tacir'in tüm kemikleri kırılmış, ogmentli kolu sökülüp yuvasından çıkarılmış ve diğer elindeki tüm parmak kemikleri bükülüp acayip açılara getirilmiş.
languages.original_text: All of the Cold Trader's bones were broken, her augmented arm was ripped from its socket, and the bones of every finger on the remaining hand are twisted and sticking out at strange angles.

traits.locale_text: Soğuk Tacir'in tüm kemikleri kırılmış, ogmentli kolu sökülüp yuvasından çıkarılmış ve diğer elindeki tüm parmak kemikleri bükülüp acayip açılara getirilmiş.
